page.title: 20THE HEADCORN WRITERS TEAM
page.content:
This area,including most of the village of Headcorn and the area of countryside to the North-West was surveyed and photographed by the pupils of class P.J. at Headcorn Primary School,especially the Explorers Club and some members of the school's staff: {CONTRIBUTORS:- (Pupils)}Alice Hannan Marilyn Watts Tim Wye Giles Sarton Iain Stocker Hayley Randell Simone Hennessey Christopher Daking {(Staff)}D.A.Morris (and husband Tim) P.L.Passey D.P.Schofield
{THANKS:-}We should like to thank the folk of our area who very kindly gave up their time to answer questions and give us advice.
{TO THE READER:-}We hope you found our little corner of Kent interesting!
